item.description:
Sat., Oct 31st Halloween Pancake Breakfast 8 a.m. - noon Fire House Ellington Road, SW

It's our first annual Halloween pancake breakfast complete with pancakes, sausage, juice and more. Kids are welcome to come dressed up for our costume contest and then take part in various crafts.

Donations accepted. All proceeds will go towards gift certificates for our Thanksgiving Baskets project.

Reservations not needed. Volunteers needed starting at 7a.m. Otherwise invite the family, friends and more for a great haunted breakfast!

For more info contact Erin at ErinSWJC@aol.com
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the hall/kitchen area.
item.name: 1st Annual Halloween Pancake Breakfast
